Table of Contents

Class UIEvent

Namespace
osu.Framework.Input.Events
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Denotes a UI event. A UI event is produced for and can be handled by a Drawable. While handling events, the Target is set to the Drawable which is handling the event.

public abstract class UIEvent

UIEvent(InputState) 

protected UIEvent(InputState state)

Parameters

state InputState

Fields

CurrentState

The current input state.

[NotNull]
public readonly InputState CurrentState

Field Value

InputState

Remarks

This raw state should not be used for event handling if not really needed. Instead, properties such as MousePosition and event data should be used.

Target

The current target Drawable of this event. This can be modified to reuse an instance many times.

[CanBeNull]
public Drawable Target

Field Value

Drawable
